7. How that unifying purpose gets understood. How is it that I already understand the final purpose?
• Insofar as I ex-sist, I understand being.
• In understanding being, I understand my own ex-sistence as engaged with the world of meaning.
• In opening up beforehand a world of praxis to which I am always already related, and in thus freeing up things to be suitable within that world, I also understand the final purpose to which they are directed.
